Introduction
This topic contains information on the effect of asset transfers, and the income associated with asset transfers, on pension benefits, including
effect of asset transfers on countable income
when a claimant transfers property but takes income from the property
transferring a partial interest in property
example 1 of transferring a partial interest in property to a person outside of the household
example 2 of transferring a partial interest in property to a person in the household
example 3 of partial interest in property – no transfer involved
definition of life estate
life estate and a claimant’s net worth
, and
computing property value when a life estate is involved
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
